alert.note: Alert for Estill; Jackson; Lee; Menifee; Powell; Wolfe (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 05 at 4:57PM EDT until September 05 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of east central Kentucky and southeast Kentucky, including the following counties, in east central Kentucky, Estill, Menifee and Powell. In southeast Kentucky, Jackson, Lee and Wolfe. * WHEN...Until 700 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 455 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to slow-moving showers and thunderstorms. Excessive runoff will cause minor flooding of small streams and creeks, roads, and roadside culverts. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... McKee, Crystal, Old Landing, Pinnacle, Greeley, Patsey, Willow Shoals, Shade, Fixer, Pilot, Leighton, Standing Rock, Leeco, Zoe and Zachariah.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

area.areaDesc: Estill; Jackson; Lee; Menifee; Powell; Wolfe
